name: Noteable! (Public Beta)
description:
----------1.2V Beta update!---------

Thanks to vimlark for playtesting the game check out his twitch right here: https://www.twitch.tv/vimlark

-----------Added---------

-Increased difficulty

-Sound effects And better player feedback

-Score and multiplier polished

- Updated notes art

-Changed controls

--------CONTROLS--------

Up arrow for note 1

Down arrow for note 2

Right arrow for note 3

Left arrow for note 4

--------ABOUT-------

Noteable is a  game me and my brother are working on. Feedback is much appreciated! If someone can get S+ Ill release a surprise :D (Comment if you got the rank)
